website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a hardshell case that offers a roomy interior and lightweight construction.
pros: An affordable bag that's crafted in hardshell material, yet lightweight enough to handle with ease
26-inch size makes it ideal for use as a carry-on bag
cons: Wheels aren't nearly as durable as the rest of the bag, and have been known to crack or break

customer_reviews.title: OK Until the Wheel Blew Out 1 Month Into Usage
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a pretty good piece. Rolled smoothly and was tough. Then today I had a short layover in Minneapolis where the gates are miles apart. I walked briskly. Granted, the luggage was full and I had my backpack on it, but it blew out a wheel. I’m really surprised beacise it wasn’t that much stress. And, unfortunately, I am 2 days after the return window. Well, I took a chance on an unreviewed item. Reminder to self: don’t do that again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Held up beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimzy. Packed it so full had to sit on to zip shut. Went toSeattle, San Fran and Phoenix twice. Held up beautifully. Wheels were great. Zippers held up great. Very happy. It is also lightweight! Good buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store clothes and sundries for my monthly trip to the office so I don't constantly have to check a bag, so I was looking for something cheap. My hotel is about a half mile from the office and after three one-way trips one of the wheels popped the rivet out of the plastic holder. The wheels are solid plastic, which is loud, rough on pavement, and not very durable. I bought a replacement set of solid rubber wheels to install. The rest of the suitcase has been ok, but has pretty much met my expectations (except for the wheels). It is cheap, do not buy this for heavy, or even medium travel.
customer_reviews.author: cdeuce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carry on size.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage was the perfect size for a week long trip to the Dominican Republic. I loved it, because of the 360° wheels. The whole purpose of purchasing this size was so that I didn't have to pay to check a bag.
customer_reviews.author: frostylondon

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a good value. I have taken two flights checking this bag. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fraud alert
customer_reviews.text: This is absulute fraud. It says 29inch on the title but i received a much smaller back. I am leaving for abroad and i have no time to return the bag and my stuff wont fit. Ridicilous
customer_reviews.author: erhan sakaoglu

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks or more
customer_reviews.text: Excellent capacity for a two or three week trip. Easy to maneuver on rollers so no need to drag the weight with you. Attractive design makes it easy to spot on baggage carousels.
customer_reviews.author: WMikecFL

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Looking well made and durable. Wish it would have had more pockets inside, but for the price I paid it is a great suitcase. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Larysa E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a tween/teen
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot and upgraded my son’s suitcase to this. It’s durable, big enough but not huge and he LOVES the colors!
customer_reviews.author: japplehunter

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Non durable, no response from seller. Wheels break after rolling through airport and zippers get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: These roll amazing and are big! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hulse

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in great shape, but.... When measured it was a 24" Expandable Hardside Spinner!! It is the same size as a suitcase I already have that was sold as a 24". Do not be deceived!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are inadequate for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase October 31, 2018. It has only been used for a few trips. This trip, August 2019, one of the wheels is completely broken! This is completely unsatisfactory! I should have paid attention to verifying this had a warranty. do not waste your money on this piece of trash!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: The real size is less than was in item description.
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase was described as 22 inch in length but actually it's less 20 inches. I wanted to buy a suitcase with length 22" because this is maximum length allowed for hand luggage in international flights. It's pity that Amazon sell such wrongly described items!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: An ok suitcase. Colorful. Stands out at the checkout. However as pointed out by others the spinner wheels are plastic and rather loud. Don't know how long it will last, but seems acceptable for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first use. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: The protection flap came off after the first use. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: bluemanta

customer_reviews.title: Durable and my son loves the colors
customer_reviews.text: This was for my twelve year old son. We travel a lot and in the three trips it has held up incredible well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne_1

customer_reviews.title: looks cool
customer_reviews.text: It was a great case, just too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.J. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is great suitcase the quality is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Javier Parra

customer_reviews.title: Wheels broke in less than 3 trips
customer_reviews.text: One of the wheels broke after 3 trips. Cool design but not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Khau

customer_reviews.title: The wheels could be a bit more smooth especially on carpeted airport floors.
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcase, compact, pretty and lots of room. Fits all airline requirements. The wheels could be a bit more smooth especially on carpeted airport floors.
customer_reviews.author: Arya Bhattacherjee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter and she loves it. I am ordering one for myself. I really like all the zippered compartments and it's expandable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did its job
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Held the 53lbs if stuff I traveled with.
customer_reviews.author: leroy

customer_reviews.title: Not enough wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Much harder to roll with only 4 wheels. I have other bags, same size with 8 wheels. Much easier to roll. I do not recommend this good looking bag.
customer_reviews.author: Via Manci

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy suitcase
customer_reviews.text: No real problems after 1 trip to Disney World, does scratch fairly easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Nerozzi

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with it. Got the blue/yellow one and should stand out on the baggage carousel.
customer_reviews.author: jerry r. zirk

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke on the first trip I took this on. My luggage was split open as it came down the luggage conveyor.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Burks

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, zipper came apart the first time that I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a family vacation and it is great!! It is so sturdy and well-made. The colors made it easy to find our luggage on the conveyor belt. We got the blue/green combo. Spacious and zippers worked great. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MARISSA L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy and the colors are lovely. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Calico Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcase
customer_reviews.text: It did a great job was amazed by what it hold easy use
customer_reviews.author: Steven p jennings

product_meta.title: U.S. Traveler Sky High Expandable Hardside Spinner Luggage, Teal, Checked-Medium 26-Inch
product_meta.description: Size:Checked-Medium 26-Inch| Color:TealMaterial: Hardshell. Abrasion-resistant diamond cut pattern makes it long lasting. Retractable handle system allows you to maneuver your bag with ease.. Dual spinner wheels provide smooth and quiet rolling. Expansion gusset offers 25% more packing capacity. Multiple sturdy handles make lifting easy and convenient. Clam shell opening provides easy organization. Corner Guard protectors for added protection. Interior lid with zip mesh cover. Tie-tapes to secure belongings. Interior zippered pocket26" Expandable Spinner. Exterior Dimensions: 25.5"H x 17"W x 11"D + 2"Expansion (Weight 8.6 lbs.) Packing Dimensions: 23.5"H x 16.5"W x 10.5"D
feature_bullets: Hardshell material - abrasion-resistant diamond cut pattern makes it long lasting
Retractable handle system and dual spinner wheels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars63 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
